name: My Cat Simulator - Catch Fish
description:
Imagine you are a cute kitty and enjoy fishing in your room!

Have you ever dreamed of having your own pet kitty? And have you ever thought, what does the world look like through a cat's eyes? Life of cat – can you imagine it? My Cat Simulator: Catch Fish gives you such a chance – explore the world while being a little cute cat!
Little cute cat goes fishing! Explore the house, run, jump and search for fishes! Find all the fishes before the time runs out. Fishing is the best fun for cats, so play with your pet and make him happy!
My Cat Simulator: Catch Fish GAME FEATURES:
Virtual cat 3D;
Really cute pet kitten;
Funny cat sounds;
Cute ginger kitty;
Time challenge – catch all the fishes;
Perfect for kids.
My Cat Simulator: Catch Fish – extremely addictive game! Play with your new pet and have fun!
